title: Mei Gongqing - Novel Updates
genre: Drama   Fantasy   Historical   Mature   Romance   Slice of Life
tags: Ancient China   Beautiful Female Lead   Clever Protagonist   Different Social Status   Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Persistent Love Interests   Politics   Reincarnation   Reverse Harem   R*pe   Schemes And Conspiracies   Second Chance   Strong Love Interests
author: Lin Jiacheng   林家成
description:
After burning herself to death, Chen Rong finds herself waking up in her 14-years old self. The past. 

Set in the Eastern Jin era when bureaucrats and their lofty yet equally hypocritical and oppressive ideas once ruled the empire, Chen Rong is made to use her past life’s experience to survive and hopefully find happiness this time around.>
